application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of drawings of a typical bay (for both King Street and Cambridge Grove elevations) in plan, section and elevation at a scale of no less than 1:20, including entrances, shopfronts, fenestration, the mansard roof and the relationship with no.100 King Street and 1 be there in 2 minutesCambridge Grove, pursuant to Condition 4; detailed drawings in plan, elevation and section at a scale of no less than 1:20, of the rooftop plant and enclosures, pursuant to Condition 6; details of a statement of how 'Secured by Design' requirements are to be adequately achieved, pursuant to the discharge of Condition 7; details showing 90% of dwellings will be built to building regulations standard M4 (2) 'Accessible and adaptable buildings' Building Regulations requirement, and the remaining 10% will be built to the M4(3) 'Wheelchair accessible dwellings' requirement, pursuant to Condition 8; details of safe, secure and accessible bicycle storage, for both the domestic and commercial uses, pursuant to the partial discharge Condition 27; details of refuse storage, including provision for the storage of recyclable materials, for both the domestic and commercial uses, pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 28; and details of all brown roofs including the substrate depth together with a section plan to show this, pursuant to Condition 31 of planning application reference: 2021/00933/FUL, allowed on appeal (ref: APP/H5390/W/22/3290703) dated 5th April 2023.
